text: @Chellie2shoes The other one I liked in that vein was the Mormon one about the forged documents.
@Chellie2shoes I mean terrifying story! But well done doc

@Chellie2shoes Oh yeah and ha I didn’t mean it like “that isn’t true crime” more like it didn’t feel as much like so many others. I mean I guess there was a little whodunit in there but it was much more broad than that which was great!
@LionelKitchy That's true I guess, I don't watch much crime stuff but that one jumped out at me

@Chellie2shoes @ComradeLuanne Oh that is probably my favorite just because it wasn’t even really a true crime doc just like yo look at this crazy shit but it also was pretty respectful of the people in it which is rare!
@ComradeLuanne the one about the guy that had the bomb collar around his neck was fucking crazy. I might watch that one again
Is there any good true crime docs or docuseries to watch besides all the big ones everyone’s already seen? And yes I’ve seen them. Don’t even suggest them.
